column5: DEEP  THOUGHTS BY MEN WHILE FISHING  Two  men are out ice fishing at their favorite fishing hole ,  just fishing quietly and drinking beer .  Almost  silently, so as not to scare the fish  , Bob    says,  'I think I'm going to divorce my wife - she hasn't spoken to me in  over 2 months.'  Frank  continues slowly sipping his beer, then  thoughtfully says ,  'You  better think it over -  women like that are hard to find.'
